name: Traverse (FelinaLain)
description:
Preface: this is a hobby project born from boredom and a love for G/t content.

You're a small Borrower in a big house, and you need to go out of your little hideout to Borrow for food and supplies. Make your way around, use your secret passages, and explore the big bean house. Controls Moving around: Should be WASD or ZQSD depending on your keyboard Sprint: left shift Looking around: Mouse Changing tool: Scroll wheel or keyboard numbers (not the numpad) Using Tools:
  • Light is automatic. On when in use, Off when not.
  • Hook: 
    • Hold left Click to charge, then release after 2 second to cast. (it has a reach of about 20 cm).
    • When hooked, hold left click to reel yourself closer, and right click to reel away.
    • Middle mouse click to release the hook. (you can swing from the hook)
  • Hand: not a tool, just the placeholder for empty hand.
  • Needle: your weapon! Left click and right click to attack!
